alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County; Northwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued May 08 at 7:43AM PDT until May 09 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM PDT MONDAY... ...FROST ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 8 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected. * WHERE...Northeastern Mendocino Interior, Northwestern Mendocino Interior and Northern Lake Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 8 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Provide adequate shelter for outdoor pets or consider bringing them indoors. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County; Northwestern Mendocino Interior
